lead_paragraph: In an effort to reverse low birthrates, the national government attempted to map the number of childbearing women by region. Many were not pleased.

headline.print_headline: A South Korean Effort to Bolster Fertility Backfires
headline.main: South Korea’s Plan to Rank Towns by Fertility Rate Backfires

snippet: In an effort to reverse low birthrates, the national government attempted to map the number of childbearing women by region. Many were not pleased....
